name: IOUserAudioBooleanControl
desc: A control object that supports setting a Boolean value.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the Boolean control class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a Boolean control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - HandleChangeControlValue
items.desc: Tells the Boolean control the value is changing.

items.name: - SetControlValue
items.desc: Sets the Boolean value of the control.

items.name: - GetControlValue
items.desc: Gets the Boolean value of the control.
